Reviews.Title: DELL Inspiron 15R
Reviews.Author: lee jumbelic
Reviews.Content: window's 8 sucks, had to download classic shell to make it tolerable.  Overall this machine is no faster than my old ACER despite 2x the RAM and i5 processor.  Also thought I was getting a touch screen which this isn't but that's my own fault for not reading the description closely ( after reading so many others on other choices)  but that's O.K.  Cannot find NUM LOCK in the Bios to turn on either so must do it manually each time I boot. One last annoyance is the right click key on the finger / thumb pad is LOUD.  Nothing wrong with this computer overall but I'd expected it to be better than the one I replaced.

Reviews.Title: awesome fix
Reviews.Author: rising*sun
Reviews.Content: This screen was very easy to install and it saved us from having to replace the laptop. I would highly recommend for a damaged screen.

Reviews.Title: A good laptop for home
Reviews.Author: Abhilash
Reviews.Content: It's a light weight fully functional laptop having a full size keyboard and CD drive. Sturdy in construction and good performance. Though knew it before buying, the only low performers are the screen resolution, OS (Win8) and not quite sure how good is the battery. Windows8 is optimized for touch screen but this is a non touch one, some times annoying with the screen gestures.

Reviews.Title: good  laptop. liked it
Reviews.Author: Venkat
Reviews.Content: big enough (Actually  screen is much bigger than what i thought it would be )keys area bit small .. having them bit bigger would have helped easier typing

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Mac87
Reviews.Content: The computer arrived in a timely fashion, which was quite nice. It came in the original packaging with all the cables. I had some questions for the sender and they responded back quickly with helpful information which was ideal. The computer worked perfectly. I recommend this computer to anyone who is looking for an affordable yet high grade laptop.

Reviews.Title: Good product. One problem is it is not mentioned ...
Reviews.Author: nandakumar
Reviews.Content: Good product.  One problem is it is not mentioned clearly whether the keyboard is back lite or not.  It would be very helpful if they can  show it high lighted.

Reviews.Title: Great price value!
Reviews.Author: Jeff Vinson
Reviews.Content: This computer was a great value for all of the hardware included (8GB Ram, 1 TB Hard drive, Windows 8, etc).  The wifi has a strong connection and the computer functions very quickly.  Our only complaint which is why we rated it 4 and not 5 stars is because the edge of the computer case is sharp and it scratches my wife's wrist while she is typing.

Reviews.Title: Laptop
Reviews.Author: Suzette P.
Reviews.Content: I'm completely happy with this Laptop. It's taking me a while to adjust to Windows 8, but the laptop itself is fast and efficient. Very sleek and great quality.

Reviews.Title: very good laptop and like it alot
Reviews.Author: Kommuru
Reviews.Content: It's a light weight fully functional laptop. Price worth for the configuration. Thanks for the product. Shipped in time. I recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: EddyT
Reviews.Content: This is the third 15R laptop I have gotten. I'm no computer expert but these seem to be a great buy for a dependable laptop.

ProductInfo.Features:
Intel Core i5-4200U Processor (3M Cache, up to 2.6 GHz)
8 GB DDR3L SDRAM
1 TB 5400 rpm Hard Drive
15.6-Inch Screen
Windows 8
ProductInfo.Name: Dell Inspiron 15R i15RM-5125sLV 15.6-Inch Laptop (Moon Silver)
